area.name: Hot Keys

entry.name: KeyAltA
entry.comment: Keyboard shortcut. Replace A with the first letter of the Actions menu text.

entry.name: KeyAltO
entry.comment: Keyboard shortcut. Replace O with the first letter of the Options menu text.

entry.name: KeyAltR
entry.comment: Keyboard shortcut. Replace R with the first letter of the Related menu text.

entry.name: KeyAltT
entry.comment: Keyboard shortcut. Replace T with the first letter of the Tools menu text.

area.entry: Opens the context menu for area in focus
Opens or closes a selected combo box
Zooms the program window in and out
Moves the cursor before the first character or the previous word in the field
Moves the cursor to the last character or the next word in the field
Opens the menu in the menu bar
Selects an Option or Related Option
Carries out the action for the active panel, field or button
Select todays date from the date picker
Moves the cursor to the first character or the previous word in the field
Moves the cursor to the last character or the next word in the field
Selects multiple rows that are not next to each other in a list (After you select a row, hold down Ctrl and select more rows)
Selects the cells on the page below the cell in focus
Selects the cells on the page above the cell in focus
Includes the next row in the selection
Includes the previous row in the selection
Highlights pre-selected items in the list
Keeps the selection and moves the cursor one row down
Keeps the selection and moves the cursor one row up
Includes the row in focus in the selection (to get a split selection)
Moves the cursor to the next/previous valid option
Moves focus to the editable cell above in an editable list
Moves focus to the editable cell below in an editable list
Shows or hides the extra row in an expandable list
Opens or closes a cell in an editable list
Moves focus to the next editable cell in an editable list
Moves focus to the previous editable cell in an editable list

area.name: M3 Info Browser Widget
area.entry: Browse customers, supplier, items, and other M3 information you use frequently.
The browse definition for field {0}, variant {1}, user {2} could not be read.
This field indicates the field name according to the reference file. The available values are found in Browse Definition. Open (MNS185)
Optional variant for the browse field
Specify settings to launch M3 using key value from the list to a program with a specified sorting order and view.
Specify the master program for the browse variant
Specify the master program for the browse definition
Specify the field name for the key field that will be sent to Mforms.
Specify the field name for the key field that will be sent to Mforms.
Specify the field name for the sorting order if you want to launch to a specific sorting order
Specify the field name for the sorting order if you want to launch to a specific sorting order
Specify the sorting order field. Use F1 on the sorting order to see the field name.
Specify the sorting order for the function that has the key field as a position field
Specify the sorting order for the function that has the key field as a position field (use F1 on the field in the function)
Specify the field name of the view field. Use F1 to see the field name in the lower corner.
Specify the field name of the view field. Use F1 to see the field name in the lower corner.
Specify the view the function should be opened with

entry.name: RepeatButtonText
entry.comment: Label on the small scroll buttons in the panel sequence navigator

area.name: Profile Info Widget
area.entry: View the current profile setup for Lawson Smart Office.
Displays the company and division that is used by IBrix. The company and division will not chnage for IBrixs during the session.
Could not load all system information

entry.name: NotAvailableLabel
entry.comment: Default text instead of company / division when cono and divi can not be retrieved

area.name: Search
area.entry: Please select where the search query should be saved.
Note! This action will save the search query performed. It will not save the list of search results.
Save as Shortcut on the Canvas
Save as Shortcut in the Toolbox Area
Showing {0} filtered hits on search for {1}

entry.name: FindInSearch
entry.comment: Top menu item for the different search types

entry.name: SearchTypeGlobal
entry.comment: Start a global search using Enterprise search

entry.name: SearchTypeField
entry.comment: Start a field context search using Enterprise search

entry.name: SearchTypeFieldAndTable
entry.comment: Start a program context search using Enterprise search

area.name: User Settings Window
area.entry: Display system messages in dialog window
Display company and division in program window
Position cursor in end of input fields
Show grid lines in list view

entry.name: PNGFiles
entry.comment: Do not translate file extension PNG

entry.name: groupByColumn
entry.comment: For a ComboBox where the group-by column can be selected

entry.name: groupByType
entry.comment: For a ComboBox where the group type can be selected, Count or Sum

entry.name: checkBoxSave
entry.comment: The visualization will be saved if the CheckBox is checked

entry.name: CheckBoxVisualizeAll
entry.comment: If checked displays all list rows, otherwise display selected list rows

area.name: Hyperlink Window
area.entry: Hyperlinks are used to navigate directly from a value in a table to a specified location.
To create a hyperlink, select a field and the action you want to perform and click Add.
The created hyperlinks are displayed in the list.

area.name: User Defined Views
area.entry: Name and describe the view you want to save.

entry.name: ViewRadioButtonInfo
entry.comment: Description of the radio button with the option to make a view personal or shared.

area.entry: Your view must have at least one column
The view could not be edited.
The view could not be saved.
The view could not be deleted.
Do you want to delete this view?
Do you want to save the changes you made in the view?
Choose a different name or edit the existing view.
The view contains the same column more than once. You must use CRS020 to edit this view.

area.name: IBrix
area.entry: The IBrix could not be started.
Your profile does not contain an M3 Workplace URL.
Your profile does not contain an M3 Workplace Application Server name.

area.name: Bookmarks

entry.name: BookmarkDefaultName
entry.comment: Default bookmark name. The {0} will be replaced by the program and panel name, ex MMS001/E Bookmark.

entry.name: Bookmarks
entry.comment: A menu that contains items for creating different bookmarks.

area.entry: Failed to create a bookmark for the current panel.
The bookmark was invalid and could not be started.

area.name: Personalization tool
area.entry: Select the entity you want to work with and click select.
Select a folder containing the personalizations you want to manage.
Select to whom you want to make the copy.
Are you sure you want to delete the selected personalization?
Copying a personalization to a role or user might overwrite any existing personalizations for this role or user.
Are you sure you want to copy the selected personalization to the selected roles?

area.name: Common

entry.name: SortingOrder
entry.comment: Noun. Previously know as Inquiry type.

entry.name: View
entry.comment: Noun. Previously known as Panel version.

entry.name: Authenticating
entry.comment: Shown when a user is being logged in.

entry.name: Starting
entry.comment: Shown when a program is starting.

area.entry: Specify the function where the Smart Link will be available
Specify the panel where the Smart Link will be available

entry.name: KeyIsNotValid
entry.comment: {0} is replaced by the invalid key

entry.name: OptionShortcut
entry.comment: {0} will be replaced with an option number

entry.name: PanelsequenceLargeMode
entry.comment: A checkable menu item for the size of the panel sequence letters

entry.name: PanelsequenceSmallMode
entry.comment: A checkable menu item for the size of the panel sequence letters

entry.name: MandatoryIndicator
entry.comment: A single character that indicates a mandatory field
